articles.title: SM Chitre, stalwart astrophysicist who once shared office with Stephen Hawking, dies at 84 - ThePrint
articles.description: A Padma Bhushan recipient, Shashikumar Madhusudhan Chitre was a former senior professor at TIFR and ex-president of the Astronomical Society of India.
articles.content: Bengaluru: Astrophysicist Shashikumar Madhusudhan Chitre, who is known for his extensive work on solar physics and research into gravitational lensing, died in Mumbai Monday after a brief illness. He… [+6042 chars]
